description:
Groups of municipalities (titles)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45412 Monthly tourism survey

Definition:
Municipalities or parts thereof that are grouped by types of
state certificates granted to them in accordance with Land-
based legal provisions (e.g. mineral and mud spas, sea-side
resorts, climatic resorts). The certificate is also referred
to as a 'title'. Municipalities without certificate are
included in the group "Other municipalities".


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Groups of municipalities (titles)
